name: Drama: Comedy
description: An historical exploration of comedy as a major form of dramatic expression. Comedy, like its more august counterpary tragedy, has been subjected to centuries of theoretical deliberation about its form and function. In this course, we will read representative works of dramatic comedy and consider how different ages have developed their own unique forms of comedy. Pre-1900 course
prerequisites:
ENGB03H3 & ENGB04H3 & [one of ENGB05H3 or (ENGB01H3)]
Alternative prerequisites: VPDB10H3 & VPDB11H3
